title: The Old Ship W6
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Raw, Beer/Wine, British, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A traditional and friendly riverside pub unique in its offering of a separate extensive 100% vegan menu, including many varied choices for sharing platters, starters, main courses and desserts. Dark wood floors and a long hardwood bar.  Antique rowing boats and Thames rowing memorabilia hang from the ceilings. A balcony overlooks the Thames adjoining the upstairs restaurant where you can dine in style with full table service.
